quotes.quote: Celebrate the new day with shouts of praise, love and grace and with a beautiful smile upon your face.
imagine if we treated each new dawn of each new day with the same reverence and joy as we do each new year.
Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
Today's a new day. It's your day. You shape it. Don't let it be shaped by someone else's ignorance or fear.
Yesterday ended last night, today is a brand new day. And it's yours.
Each new day is a blank page in the diary of your life. The secret of success is in turning that diary into the best story you possibly can.
Here on the pulse of this new day, You may have the grace to look up and out And into your sister's eyes, into Your brother's face, your country And say simply, Very simply, With hope, Good Morning.
The light of a new day always chases the shadows of the night away, and shows us that the shape of our fears is only the ghost of our own minds.
A new day: Be open enough to see opportunities. Be wise enough to be grateful. Be courageous enough to be happy.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Every morning starts a new page in your story. Make it a great one today.
When a new day begins, dare to smile gratefully.
Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
The next morning dawned bright and sweet, like ribbon candy.
Today is a new day. Even if you were wrong yesterday, you can get it right today.
Today is a BRAND NEW day a perfectly good reason to get up and start over. Never give up.
Isn't it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
Each new day brings new opportunities. You have to search to be able to find these opportunities.
Each new day offers the chance to start afresh, to achieve those things you most desire.
When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
Today is a brand new day. Forget about yesterday. It does not matter. Forget about tomorrow it will take care of itself. Concentrate on this day. Make it the best ever.
I'm glad tomorrow's a new day 'cause I really messed this one up...
On the other side of this darkness, a new day will slowly dawn.
If the sun comes up, I have a chance.
Work to realize the possibility of this new day and to make it a truly great one.
Tomorrow, is the first blank page of a 365 page book. Write a good one.
This is a new day. Begin anew to claim and create all that is good.
A new day will come and when the sun shines it will shine out the clearer.
When you take the U out of mourning, it's a brand new day!
Every day is new. It's just a new day. I look at six hours at a time.
I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
Approach each new day as a new opportunity to be the person you aspire to be.
Every new day begins with possibilities. It's up to us to fill it with the things that move us toward progress and peace.
There is a deep, peaceful calm in the dawning of a new day.
Never look back reminiscing on yesterday , smile for the future tomorrow's a new day.
Light is sweet; how pleasant to see a new day dawning.
The new day has greeted us with no rules except for the rules we placed with it, greet it with open arms and endless possibility.
When you start each day with a grateful heart, light illuminates from within.
The best way to start a new day is to ask God to refresh and clean our heart and mind.
When I wake up every morning, I thank God for the new day.
Every new day is another chance to change your life.
Every morning is a chance at a new day.
Every day is a new day. It is better to be lucky. But I would rather be exact. Then when luck comes you are ready.
Today is a new day.You will get out of it just what you put into it.
Everyone has highs and lows that they have to learn from, but every morning I start off with a good head on my shoulders, saying to myself,  It's going to be a good day!
You just can't live that negative way. You know what I mean? Make way for the positive day cause it's a new day.
I would like this to be a new day. I would hope now that we can focus on doing the people's business.
All great beginnings start in the dark, when the moon greets you to a new day at midnight.
It's a new dawn. It's a new day. It's a new life for me and I'm feeling good.
Participate in your dreams today. There are unlimited opportunities available with this new day. Take action on those wonderful dreams you've had in your mind for so long.
New day, new hopes, new life!
Never mind those failures till yesterday. Each new day is a sequel of a wonderful life; gifted with hopes to succeed.
Every new day is an opportunity to grow your love.
Each day is always breaking out anew. Aspirations swirling round what you do
Accept the past as the past and realize that each new day you are a new person who doesn’t need to carry old baggage into the new day with you.
Embrace every new day with gratitude, hope and love.
Each sunrise brings a new day filled with new hopes for a new beginning.
Every new day is a sacred gift with new sacred grace.
Let your past be a reason for growth and greatness not blame and shame. Today is a new day!
No matter how gloomy the morning, it is a new day where anything is possible.
Learn from everyone but be your own guidance, and you will find a red-hot feeling in your chest each night, eager for the possibilities of a new day. No one knows your heart as well as you do.
Every sunset is an opportunity to reset. Every sunrise begins with new eyes.
New day, new month, new visions.
Each new day is an invitation to an adventure of your own making.
Whoever has the courage to walk in the dark, share experience the dawn of light in a new day.
Every new morning gives fresh hope, for great is the mercy of the new day
Hit the reset button. Whatever happened yesterday, forget about it. Get a new perspective. Today is a new day. Fresh start, begins now.
Be grateful for the grace of a new day.
Every new day is the dawn of a new grace.
Every new day is a dawn of a new divine order.
The beauty of a bright new day!
A new day always comes with new hopes, new opportunities, and new lives.
Starting out a new day gives hope for new adventures, villains and hero's to cross your path. Make the most of it.
Embrace each new day with great expectations.
Every new day brings new adoration and new adventure.
Every new day, I reach out to the best of myself by grace.
Embrace the sacredness of a new day.
Every new day gives me ceaseless hope to reach out for my dreams
Tommorow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.
Upon the birth of a new day as we see our forefathers pave the way. We see the tyranny of evil men.
Every day is a new day; bringing along with it overwhelming loads of happiness, and an unparalleled rhapsody to blissfully lead life.
Look, the dawn is dancing breaking through the night, joyfully commanding light-- into day's new start.
Dreamer awakes, thought still in maze, consciousness stirred, alertness in place, new day embraced.
